book.synopsis: The final volume of this series includes 5 weeks of video curriculum and study material on chapters 36-40 of The Purpose Driven Life, focusing on Purpose #5: You Were Made for a Mission. God loves the world, and he wants to love it through you. Volume 6 will help you live a life of significance by making the Great Commission your commission.
book.title_long: Una Vida Con Proposito {40 Weeks Of Purpose Vol 6 Book : You Were Created for a Mission (40 Weeks of Purpose (Spanish)} (40 Semanas con proposito) (Spanish Edition)
